title: ‘Novichok’: The chemical weapon used on Sergei Skripal
text:
‘Novichok’: The chemical weapon used on Sergei Skripal 2:01pm EDT - 02:05 
The British government contends that the poison used on former spy Sergei Skripal was an obscure nerve agent called ''Novichok.'' It's one of the deadliest chemical weapons ever developed, rooted in a secretive Cold War program from Russia. Anthony Deutsche explains. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
The British government contends that the poison used on former spy Sergei Skripal was an obscure nerve agent called "Novichok." It's one of the deadliest chemical weapons ever developed, rooted in a secretive Cold War program from Russia. Anthony Deutsche explains.
